title: Addition Function
description: Create a function called `add` that takes two integers and prints their sum. Then call it with user input.
instructions:
1. Define `add(a: Int, b: Int)`.
2. In `main()`, read two integers using `readln().toInt()`.
3. Call `add()` with the inputs.

hints.text: Function signature: fun add(a: Int, b: Int)
